MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  WA11 postcode area of ST. Helens, affecting properties in Crank Hill, Alder Lane, Higher Lane  and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:09PM on 20th February 2021.
